scripts.bootstrap: lerna bootstrap && lerna exec npm install
scripts.build:all: npm run clear && for dir in packages/*; do package=${dir#'packages/'}; rollup -c rollup-package.config.js --scope @prpl/$package || exit 1; done && npx rollup -c rollup-client.config.js
scripts.build:changed: npm run clear && lerna changed | while read package; do npx rollup -c rollup-package.config.js --scope $package || exit 1; done && npx rollup -c rollup-client.config.js
scripts.reset: npm run clear && rm -rf ./**/.cache && rm -rf ./**/node_modules && rm -rf ./package.lock && npm run bootstrap
